content: X-BR S Bridle ring with saddle and nail Bridle ring with plastic saddle and pre-mounted nail for use with powder-actuated tools on tough concrete ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Time-saving solution – bridle ring pre-assembled with baseplate, plastic saddle and DX ALH nail, delivered ready to install using powder-actuated tool Plenum-rated plastic saddle – increases the bearing surface area to provide the optimal bending radius and support for data cable bundles Safer and higher-productivity method for overhead applications – powder-actuated tools with a compatible pole tool remove the need for lifts and ladders Maximized stick rate – high-performance pre-mounted ALH nail for tough concrete Virtually dust-free solution – no drilling required Applications Support for high-performance data cable bundles Support for sensitive wires and low-voltage cables Support for cables in air handling (plenum-rated) spaces For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Suspended systems Material: Carbon steel, Polyamide (PA), Flame-retardant, Plenum rated For use with (tools): DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6 Technical Data | Application | Suspended systems | Material | Carbon steel, Polyamide (PA), Flame-retardant, Plenum rated | For use with (tools) | DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6 | Base materials | Concrete (very tough), Concrete (tough), Concrete (normal-weight over metal deck) | Approvals (global) | UL | Cable capacity (CAT 5e cable, 70% fill rate) | 37 | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Cable capacity (CAT 6A cable, 70% fill rate) | 17 | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2230060 - Bridle ring X-BR S 2 ALH27 - Package Size 50 pc
